website_summaries.verdict: A case that is ultra-tough and will protect your MacBook Pro against falls and drops.
pros: Matte finish gives the case a one-of-a-kind appearance
Sold with anti-dust plugs and a silicone keyboard cover
Hard case is durable and provides superior impact protection
Holes on the bottom of the case deliver exceptional heat dissipation
cons: May be too big or too small for some MacBook Pro models
Case tends to come apart on its own

customer_reviews.title: really like it! I don't think the green keyboard cover ...
customer_reviews.text: Fits snug and perfectly, really like it! I don't think the green keyboard cover really matches the outside (I didn't think so from the pictures either) but I really just wanted the covers for the ports and the case itself, and I love them. They also came inside a really nice reusable bag, that I will probably use to store the case in when I switch out cases (I like to mix it up and go back and forth between what cases I use). Arrived on time too.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Lowe

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what you expect.
customer_reviews.text: This color choice added life to the drab black cover I was using. If you are looking for total drop protection, look elsewhere. But, if you are looking for scratch and bump protection this is one great option. Snaps into place securely without much flex. It is strong. One will tell about stress cracking. Comes with a soft keyboard cover and port plugs. These plugs are off color, but will be used regardless.
customer_reviews.author: Paulus Maximus

customer_reviews.title: Great Hardcase (shell) for the Macbook A1502.
customer_reviews.text: As pictured. This fits my Macbook Pro (A1502) perfectly、 was super easy to install and came packaged well. The keyboard cover & all of the port covers are an added bonus. Very pretty matte maroon-red color. It did come in a bubble mailer so、 I was a little nervous about it possibly being broken、 but it wasn't. This is definitely more of a shell than a protective case、 but it was exactly what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: WonderWoman

customer_reviews.title: The cover for the laptop and the keyboard are great. However
customer_reviews.text: The cover for the laptop and the keyboard are great. However, it the description lists port covers and none came with the case. I tried to find a way to contact the seller but could not find a link. Update - I was finally able to find a link to contact the seller. I will update once I hear back.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks much better in the picture online
customer_reviews.text: Looks much better in the picture online. The small pieces fall out with little to no effort. The keyboard cover was disappointing as well. The letters were discolored in places and it moves around when you are typing- more trouble than it is worth!!! Cover material is nice- just wish is it looked as bright as it does in the picture. In real life the color is muted and doesn’t look like the picture.
customer_reviews.author: Morgan and Bill Wilkinson

customer_reviews.title: Survived Africa
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my semester in Africa, and it stood up well to the heat, humidity, bugs, and toddlers that I worked with while I was there. My laptop fell off a chair, and the case did crack in one corner, but I would much rather the case than the computer. All in all, I recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: NWarner

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful. I just wish the color was a bit brighter but overall beautiful. The port covers is way brighter than the actual color of the case. It's still nice and it gets the job done. I'll update if anything changes as I just got it yesterday.
customer_reviews.author: Cutie

customer_reviews.title: beautiful
customer_reviews.text: I like how nice it is to put on my laptop. It gives it a beautiful look. The case feels thick and like it will protect my laptop. the keyboard protector sticks on and doesn't leave imprints on my screen. The ports are easy to put on and protect from water.
customer_reviews.author: Arely

customer_reviews.title: Okay but doesn't fit great
customer_reviews.text: While the price was very reasonable, I was a bit disappointed as the top case did not fit over my laptop "perfectly" as it was advertised. I was also looking forward to using the little rubber protectors to keep dust and debris from getting into my headphone jack, usb port etc, but these were very flimsy and did not stay in. The one great thing was the keyboard cover, which fit spectacularly and was clear enough that my backlit keys shined through, but dark enough that dirt was not noticeable. Overall, for the price I was satisfied, but not in awe.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fits well and pretty
customer_reviews.text: This cover and keyboard cover transformed my MacBook. It fits perfectly and I have gotten tons of compliments.
customer_reviews.author: Mom of 4 great kids

customer_reviews.title: Pretty color
customer_reviews.text: Accidentally ordered a size too small. The company got in touch and sent me the correct size. Fits perfectly, sturdy, a bit heavy but nothing unexpected. I got the clear case so it almost looks like there's nothing on. Prevents scratches when I throw it in my purse!
customer_reviews.author: Joyce

customer_reviews.title: The case was the wrong size and it dd not ...
customer_reviews.text: The first case I received was the wrong size and it dd not come with any the rubber feet or the keyboard. I emailed them and the were very nice and polite about the issue and sent me one that fits and came with all the parts! the packaging was also way better then the last time! Now that I have what I ordered I love the case and all that came with it. I like looking at reviews and I have them determine if the product is worth the purchase and this was worth the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous color but that’s it
customer_reviews.text: Have had this case for a year I believe and it’s already chipped. The rubber plugs were useless as they didn’t fit well so they were constantly coming out. It’s a great color
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: nice case. great for what i paid for
customer_reviews.text: nice case. great for what i paid for. had for about 2 weeks it stays on, except the rubber side things don’t stay in which is the only downfall. :( and the keyboard cover is starting to come up on the sides but will keep you posted. you also can only see the apple when it’s on but that’s okay and it’s a nice rubbery like material. you also can see my fingerprints on the case.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product! The color is clear and vibrant and ...
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product! The color is clear and vibrant and the quality is good as well! I bought the pink version of this case well over a year ago and it's still in great condition, even after being dropped and carried to and from school. This year I decided to buy the green version and I love it! Overall, great product and amazing customer service! Would definitely recommend buying this case!
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Morrone

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: This cover and keyboard protector work very well and fit my MAC perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Mistie Potts

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: It says the cover fits a 13 in but it doesn’t
customer_reviews.author: Ollie25

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: This was of great quality, it was better than what I expected. I recommend this product
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality For a Good Price
customer_reviews.text: Love this item! It came super quick and it was easy to attach to my laptop. It's also durable for a reasonable price. I bought a spec case for my laptop when I first bought it and paid $35.00. It cracked within a week and was a pain. This is a good price for the quality:-)
customer_reviews.author: Courtney Williamson

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic customer service
customer_reviews.text: When the product arrived the plug covers did not match the case. We contacted Lention about it and they immediately offered to send us out a new set that did match. It arrived within 2 days of contacting them and matched great. The case is great and the color is exactly what I wanted!
customer_reviews.author: A. Myers

customer_reviews.title: Decent Case
customer_reviews.text: First impressions very good, great color, fits good except for the keyboard which didnt fit 100%. Looks like i got a defect item which has cracked on few spots but the seller sent me a new one which is solid so far. Great customer service, new keyboard fits perfect and case is good.
customer_reviews.author: Kostadin Loparski

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful case. People ask me all of the time where I purchased.
customer_reviews.author: l8dluck

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely loved this. To bad it was the wrong size ...
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely loved this . To bad it was the wrong size for my Mac. Now i can’t find the color for my size .
customer_reviews.author: Akilah

customer_reviews.title: I definitely recommend to someone looking for a good laptop case
customer_reviews.text: Everything fit perfectly! I definitely recommend to someone looking for a good laptop case. Everything is exactly as pictured.
customer_reviews.author: Raina Osmundson

customer_reviews.title: Is a good buy.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice lightweight easy to install however it’s not that durable.
customer_reviews.author: janina

customer_reviews.title: Great case, the feet on the bottom are nice ...
customer_reviews.text: Great case, the feet on the bottom are nice quality and don't fall off. My original case was cracked while shipping and the company sent me a new one quickly and it is great.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Klimt

customer_reviews.title: Color
customer_reviews.text: It’s a cool Lil case I ain’t think the color was gone be on point but It is now if I can only get my computer from my gf I’ll try It out
customer_reviews.author: Yani lee

customer_reviews.title: As advertised!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a hard protector/case for my macbook pro. So easy to install - love the color! It's just what I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: elljay

customer_reviews.title: love to color
customer_reviews.text: love to color! not really sure if the pugs were necessary because they kept falling off but case is great
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great quality case, but it gets terrible finger prints on it.
customer_reviews.author: Terra Radermacher

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: color is good but the case doesn't fit well... it looks cheap
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this case. It’s a amazing quality, fits perfectly, and looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Cheyenne and Omar

customer_reviews.title: Thank you LENTİON
customer_reviews.text: So cute and very nice quality 👍🏻 Thank you LENTİON
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: LENTION Hard Case for MacBook Pro (Retina, 13-inch, Late 2012 to Early 2015) - Model A1425 and A1502, with Keyboard Cover and Port Plugs, Matte Finish Case with Rubber Feet (Wine Red)
feature_bullets: Only fits MacBook Pro (Retina, 13-inch, Early 2015/2014/2013/Late 2012) - Model A1425/A1502. No Cut Out design, transparency is different from color to color
Including keyboard cover and port plugs to protect your Mac against dusts and contaminates. Highly recommend, extremely useful
Made of sturdy plastic that protects your Mac from scratches and striking. Micro clips on the case for easy installation & removal
The bottom case has 4 black rubber feet, same color as Mac's, much better than the easily wear-away white foam feet
Come with LENTION 1 year warranty on case, keyboard cover and port plugs and LENTION lifetime after-sales services

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.0 out of 5 stars92 ratings4.0 out of 5 stars
